game.name: Bike Racing 2
game.description:
The awesome sequel to the most popular and highly addictive online bike racing game is out! Do you again want to keep you entertained for hours? Join Bike Racing 2 and be prepared to practice your bike riding abilities again to maintain your balance in the mid-air! The track is not plane, so you have to keep yourself ready to learn how to overcome the steep roads to clear all the challenging and tricky levels. Try not to crash your motorcycle for your survival till the level is complete!

Use stunts and do not hesitate in making some backflips to earn extra stars and boost your final score! Choose any environment from the three wonderful options, Mountains, Winter and Desert and get ready to enter the biggest racing competition of your life! It requires putting your utmost driving abilities to get some extra air time while performing some death-defying back flips that will directly affect your points positively. Do not forget to use the stars you earn to unlock new bike models to have more fun without download.

Each environment allows you to explore 30 unique and lovely levels in this hill climb racing game. Work hard to finish each level without flipping over! Perform as many tricks and stunts as you can in the shortest possible time to complete each level with the maximum possible score! This HTML5 motorbike game features brand new bikes and come even more engaging courses to drive. Good luck finishing all fun-packed challenges with the maximum possible stars!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Bike Racing 2 at atmegame.com ! We have selected this games for best excitement and thrill in you!

game.mobileControlKeys: L ICONS TO FLIP, RIGHT ICONS TO MOVE AND STOP
game.webControlKeys: UP ARROW TO SPEED, DOWN TO BREAK, L-R ARROWS TO FLIP
